page.title: 05CHAPEL,CHURCH,CHOIRS;FUNDS.
page.content: A{Chapel}in Yarpole is now closed, the Chapel on the Common is still active.The{Church}with separate Belfry is being re-furbished;there are fetes, fairs and other fund raising functions and concerts. The{P.C.C.}work hard to keep Church life going. The{Birchpole Choir}was founded in 1978 by John Morris and Tom Howard,now there are 27 members with a Mens'Choir (10), Childrens'Choir (10),and Church Choir (12); D.Hutton,R.King,and Mrs Luzili Malindi-King share conducting. {Lord Croft}though no longer owner of the Croft Estate, is Lord of the Manor and very generous in his support of village needs. In 1973 A.W.+E.C.Thompson started a {waste recycling}committee,the money being used to improve local amenities.
